mapper.update:
update LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC
TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{record.triggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXEC.TRIGGER_UID = #{record.triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXEC.EXECUTION_ID = #{record.executionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEXEC.START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEXEC.END_DATE = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEXEC.USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEXEC.STATUS_ID = #{record.statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEXEC.STATUS_TEXT = #{record.statusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXEC.AFFECTED_RECORDS = #{record.affectedRecords,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEXEC.LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{record.lastAccExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC set TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{record.triggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEXEC.TRIGGER_UID = #{record.triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEXEC.EXECUTION_ID = #{record.executionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEXEC.START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEXEC.END_DATE = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEXEC.USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEXEC.STATUS_ID = #{record.statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEXEC.STATUS_TEXT = #{record.statusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEXEC.AFFECTED_RECORDS = #{record.affectedRecords,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEXEC.LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{record.lastAccExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL
TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTION_ID = #{executionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS_TEXT = #{statusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AFFECTED_RECORDS = #{affectedRecords,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{lastAccExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{triggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL set TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTION_ID = #{executionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_TEXT = #{statusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AFFECTED_RECORDS = #{affectedRecords,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID = #{lastAccExecutionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{triggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD as TEXEC_UID_ACTIVIDAD, TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID as TEXEC_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, TEXEC.TRIGGER_UID as TEXEC_TRIGGER_UID, TEXEC.EXECUTION_ID as TEXEC_EXECUTION_ID, TEXEC.START_DATE as TEXEC_START_DATE, TEXEC.END_DATE as TEXEC_END_DATE, TEXEC.USER_ID as TEXEC_USER_ID, TEXEC.STATUS_ID as TEXEC_STATUS_ID, TEXEC.STATUS_TEXT as TEXEC_STATUS_TEXT, TEXEC.AFFECTED_RECORDS as TEXEC_AFFECTED_RECORDS, TEXEC.LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID as TEXEC_LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID, AEXEC.ACC_EXECUTION_UID, AEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, AEXEC.ACTION_UID, AEXEC.MANUAL_EXECUTION, AEXEC.START_DATE, AEXEC.END_DATE, AEXEC.USER_ID, AEXEC.STATUS_ID, AEXEC.STATUS_TEXT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
FROM LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC LEFT JOIN LY_ACTIONS_EXEC_TBL AEXEC ON (AEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND AEXEC.ACC_EXECUTION_UID = TEXEC.LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID)
order by ${orderByClause}
